member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataAdapterFactory
member.summary: Provides basic information about data adapter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataAdapterFactory.Description
member.summary: Gets the description of the data adapter.

member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataItem
member.summary: Represents data artifact that can be transferred between source and sink.

member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataItem.GetFieldNames
member.summary: Provides collection of field names available in the data artifact.

member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataItem.GetValue(System.String)
member.summary: Provides a value of the specified data artifact field.

member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataSinkAdapter
member.summary: Represents write-only data storage.

member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataSinkAdapter.WriteAsync(Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataItem,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Writes one data artifact to the storage.
member.returns: Task that represents asynchronous write operation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataSinkAdapter.CompleteAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Signals that no more data artifacts will be sent.
member.remarks: Call to this method can occur before all write tasks (returned by WriteAsync) have completed, thus no resources should be disposed in this method. Instead, this method is useful when implementing batch operations, e.g. last batch can be submitted to the underlying storage.
member.returns: Task that represents asynchronous write operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataSinkAdapter.MaxDegreeOfParallelism
member.summary: Gets number of maximum supported parallel write operations.

member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataSourceAdapterFactory`1
member.summary: Provides data source adapters capable of reading data.
member.typeparam: Type of the data source adapter configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataSourceAdapterFactory`1.CreateAsync(`0,Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataTransferContext,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of with the provided configuration.
member.returns: Task that represents asynchronous create operation.

member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataSinkAdapterFactory`1
member.summary: Provides data sink adapters capable of writing data.
member.typeparam: Type of the data sink adapter configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataSinkAdapterFactory`1.CreateAsync(`0,Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataTransferContext,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of with the provided configuration.
member.returns: Task that represents asynchronous create operation.

member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataSourceAdapter
member.summary: Represents read-only data storage.

member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataSourceAdapter.ReadNextAsync(Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.ReadOutputByRef,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Reads one data artifact from the storage.
member.param: Object holding additional information about the data artifact. Instance of will be provided, implementation only need to fill in the properties.
member.returns: Task that represents asynchronous read operation.

member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataTransferContext
member.summary: Provides additional information about the data transfer operation.

member.summary: Gets name of the data source adapter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.IDataTransferContext.SinkName
member.summary: Gets name of the data sink adapter.

member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.NonFatalReadException
member.summary: Represents non-critical data read error.
member.remarks: This exception can be thrown when data source adapter encounters an error, but can continue reading next data artifacts.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of .

member.summary: Creates a new instance of .

member.summary: Creates a new instance of .

member.summary: Creates a new instance of .
member.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.NonFatalReadException.Convert(System.Exception)
member.summary: Converts provided to .
member.param: Source to extract message and inner exception from.
member.returns: New instance of with source message and inner exception.

member.name: T:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.ReadOutputByRef
member.summary: Container for additional information of data read operation.
member.remarks: Since passing variables by reference is not supported with async operations, this container class is used to obtain additional information.

member.name: F:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.ReadOutputByRef.None
member.summary: Singleton instance to use where actual value does not matter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.ReadOutputByRef.Wipe
member.summary: Removes all values from the current container.

member.name: P:Microsoft.DataTransfer.Extensibility.ReadOutputByRef.DataItemId
member.summary: Gets or sets data artifact identifier.

member.name: T:AssemblyRef
member.summary: Sets public key string for friend assemblies.

member.name: F:AssemblyRef.ProductPublicKey
member.summary: ProductPublicKey is an official MS supported public key for external releases. TestPublicKey is an unsupported strong key for testing and internal use only
